name: HaQuery
description: Web framework with php/neko and js target.
releasenote:
UrlRewriteRegex support.
New build options --ignore-pages and --only-pages-package.
Components final html cache support.
Nested fields for list.bind() objects (you can write "{obj.field}" in template.html).
Added logSlowSystemCalls config option.
Profiler improvements.
Speedup.
Many bugfixes.
